result.pre: Discussion The outbreak of MenW among the ATSI population in
result.post: Australia was unique because it juxtaposed a well-resourced healthcare

result.pre: to covering vast distances, a socially disadvantaged population, and a
result.post: process that was rapid and unpredictable. The clinical and

result.pre: During 2016, Indigenous persons in Australia comprised 3.3% of the

result.post: burden for numerous infectious conditions, including lower respiratory tract
